name: Play Go with friends (not VR)
description:
Welcome!

This is a Go game you can play with a friend. It can also play with the VR version (sold separately).

Three ways to play

1. Hotseat with keyboard + mouse on a single computer.
2. Over the internet with a friend, each on their computer (keyboard + mouse).
3. Over the internet with a friend, one or both playing in VR.

Buy the VR version!
